bibdata.title: American National Standard Performance Criteria for Instrumentation Used for Inplant Plutonium Monitoring
American National Standard Performance Criteria for Instrumentation Used for Inplant Plutonium Monitoring

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The monitoring of plutonium requires special instrumentation considerations in order to achieve optimum measurement performance. Performance specifications consistent with current state-of-art instrumentation technology is provided in this standard and is applicable to plutonium handling and storage facilities, excluding reactors and irradiated fuel reprocessing facilities.<<ETX>>
